title: tomcc:将要计划0.15
author: 幻境雲達達
txt_content:
本帖最后由 XJue_DaDa 于 2016-2-19 08:28 编辑 
 tomcc:我将在西雅图为0.15的发布做计划，并且会有很多酷的东西出现，或许是有资源包?

replies.author: LeoPro
replies.txt_content: 好！希望0.15能出指令和命令方块。

replies.author: fsxitutu
replies.txt_content: 最重要的是要出活塞。

replies.author: Jingji132
replies.txt_content:
LeoPro 发表于 2016-2-19 08:16
好！希望0.15能出指令和命令方块。
指令与命令方块可以说是MC中最复杂的了（不对的话，难道红石最复杂吗？）
连红石都要分三个版本，可见MOJANG有多懒指令要出几个版本？

replies.author: 零獴
replies.txt_content: 原版支持材质包要来了？

replies.author: falsh_asan
replies.txt_content:
面对跳票，你说又有多少个补档JS
当然PE可能即将进入mod时代

replies.author: lzs1234
replies.txt_content: 别着急啊，先修了0.14的bug再说话
难道不出0.14.x？

replies.txt_content: 0.15希望出活塞

replies.author: XLing_dada
replies.txt_content: 活塞、海洋神殿and末地是最重要的

指令与命令方块可以说是MC中最复杂的了（不对的话，难道红石最复杂吗？）
连红石都要分三个版本，可见MOJ ...
我很希望出指令和命令方块。
这只是幻想！

replies.txt_content: Resource Pack Great!

replies.txt_content: 不是说要出beta版么

replies.author: Actahedral
replies.txt_content:
未来的更新:

Hello!We are back with a delicious beta test of Minecraft: Pocket Edition, available for download for Android devices. Continuing to the second phase of discovering Redstone with Piston and Dispensers - just to mention a few!Currently the beta test is available to Google Play Store users, but keep in mind that this update will be coming to Minecraft: Pocket Edition and the Minecraft: Windows 10 Edition beta in the near future.Here’s a quick explanation of how to join and leave the test group. We strongly recommend you make backups of your existing worlds first.You’ll need three things to join the test:An Android device that can run Minecraft Pocket Edition.Minecraft: Pocket Edition Android purchased from Google Play Store.To opt in to the Minecraft Pocket Edition Beta.

The app will be automatically downloaded and installed on your device once you’ve joined the test. It can take a few days to appear so please be patient.All future updates to the beta will be posted on our small blog.Useful Links:Pocket Edition on Google Play StoreBeta UpdatesFAQHow to report a bugHow to make a backup

Here’s the full changelog:New Features:New World Generator
Piston
Horse
Guardian
Submarine Shrine
Jungle Shrine
End World
You can ride a pig
Carrot fishing rod
Town end
……
Tweaks:Cleaned up textures a whole lot.Replaced Pocket Edition start screen with new UI.……

Bug Fixes:
Copy synthesis rename items.
……
